description: Glance is a minimal, fast markdown viewer. Open a file, see it rendered. Nothing else.

userStories.title: Open Markdown File via CLI
acceptanceCriteria: Running `glance file.md` opens a window with rendered markdown
Startup completes in under 200ms
Exit code 0 on success, exit code 1 with error message if file not found or empty

userStories.title: Hot Reload on File Changes
acceptanceCriteria: File changes detected via filesystem watcher
Re-render triggered automatically on save
Scroll position preserved after reload

userStories.title: View Syntax-Highlighted Code Blocks
acceptanceCriteria: Code blocks rendered with highlight.js
Language auto-detected or specified via fence (```js, ```python, etc.)
Copy button appears on hover

userStories.title: View Mermaid Diagrams
acceptanceCriteria: Mermaid code blocks render as SVG diagrams
Failed diagrams show inline error message
Diagrams respect dark/light mode

userStories.title: Drag and Drop File
acceptanceCriteria: Dropping .md file opens it in current window
Window title updates to new filename
Previous file's watch is stopped, new file is watched

userStories.title: Open File via System Dialog
acceptanceCriteria: Cmd+O (Ctrl+O on Windows/Linux) opens native file picker
Filter shows .md files by default
Selected file opens in current window

userStories.title: View Images in Markdown
acceptanceCriteria: Local relative paths resolved from markdown file location
Remote URLs fetched and displayed
Base64 embedded images rendered
Broken images show alt text or placeholder

userStories.title: Follow System Theme
acceptanceCriteria: Detects system theme preference on launch
Responds to system theme changes in real-time
GitHub-style markdown CSS adapts to theme

userStories.title: Zoom Content
acceptanceCriteria: Cmd+Plus zooms in, Cmd+Minus zooms out, Cmd+0 resets
Zoom level persists for session
Content remains readable at all zoom levels

userStories.title: Remember Window State
acceptanceCriteria: Window size and position saved on close
Restored on next launch
Falls back to sensible defaults if no saved state

userStories.title: Handle Large Files Gracefully
acceptanceCriteria: Files over 500KB show outline/TOC by default
Sections expandable inline (accordion style)
Multiple sections can be open simultaneously
`--no-truncate` flag renders entire file
Config file option: `no_truncate = true`

userStories.title: Associate with OS File Handler
acceptanceCriteria: App registers as handler for .md files
Double-click .md file opens in Glance (if set as default)
Works on macOS, Windows, and Linux

userStories.title: Copy Code from Code Blocks
acceptanceCriteria: Copy button appears on hover over code blocks
Click copies code content to clipboard
Visual feedback confirms copy action
